title: Who is the most famous K-Pop producer? - Quora

response.answer_text: This guy is none other than   Teddy Park (Park Hong Jun, 박홍준) from YG Entertainment. He is a songwriter, producer and a Korean-American rapper. He debuted in a hip-hop group called 1TYM way back. And he once refused Lady Gaga's offer to work together just to focus more on 2NE1. He had produced many hit songs from the 2nd generation (maybe way back from the 1st gen) until now. I'll list some of his works (some are not entirely his but has a part) that you might know from the 2nd generation until now. 2008 Sunset Glow - BigbangOnly Look At Me - TaeyangD.I.S.C.O - Uhm Jong Hwa ft. TOP2009 Fire - 2NE1I Don't Care - 2NE1In The Club - 2NE1Let's Go Party - 2NE1Lollipop - Bigbang ft. 2NE1Gossip Man - G-Dragon ft. Kim Gun Mo (Heart breaker Album)The Leaders - G-Dragon, CL, Teddy Park2010 The Shouts of Reds pt. 2 - Bigbang ft. Yuna KimBreak Down - TaeyangWhere U At - TaeyangWedding Dress - TaeyangSuperstar - TaeyangCan't Nobody - 2NE1Go Away - 2NE1You and I - BOMKiss - Sandara ParkFollow Me - 2NE1High High - GD & TOPDon't Go Home - GD & TOPOh Yeah - GD & TOP ft. BOMTurn It Up - TOP2011 Love Song - BigbangI Am The Best - 2NE1Ugly - 2NE1Lonely - 2NE12012 Alive (Intro) - BigbangLove Dust - BigbangBlue - BigbangFantastic Baby - BigbangI Love You - 2NE1Crayon - G-DragonThat XX - G-DragonMissing You - ft. Kim Yoon Ah2013 Rose - Lee HiThe Baddest Female - CLMissing You - 2NE1Falling In Love - 2NE1Niliria - G-Dragon ft. Missy ElliotNiliria - G-dragon versionR. O. D - G-Dragon ft. Lydia PaekJust Another Boy (Instrumental) - Who Is Next, WIN (YG Survival Show)2014 Come Back Home - 2NE1Gotta Be You - 2NE1Good To You - 2NE1MTBD - CLHappy - 2NE1Scream - 2NE1I'm Him - MINO (Winner)Eyes, Nose, Lips - Taeyang1AM - TaeyangBody - TaeyangCome Here - Masta Wu ft. Dok2, Bobby2015 Loser - BigbangBang Bang Bang - BigbangWe Like 2 Party - BigbangLet's Not Fall In Love - BigbangSober - BigbangZutter - GD & TOPBae Bae - BigbangAnthem - B.I & BobbyApology - iKONDaddy - PSY ft. CL2016 My Star - Lee HiWhistle - BPBoombayah - BPStay - BPPlaying With Fire - BPFXXK It - BigbangGirlfriend - Bigbang2017 Bullshit - G-DragonSuperstar - G-Dragon*Gashina - Sunmi*As If It's Your Last - BPWhite Night (Intro) - TaeyangDarling - TaeyangRide - TaeyangAmazin - TaeyangJust Dance - Mixnine2018 *Heroine - Sunmi*Ddu ddu ddu ddu - BPForever Young - BPReally - BPSee U Later - BPBeautiful - iKON1,2,3 - SeungriSOLO - Jennie2019 Kill This Love - BPDon't Know What to Do - BPKick It - BPHope Not - BPI couldn't find informations about his awards and nominations list but I remembered he won Composer of the Year for Gaon Chart Music Awards 2019, the music award where KRUNK showed up instead of Teddy. Strange how KRUNK's name is not Teddy. Well Teddy was born first before KRUNK so. XD  Out of all the producers, he is probably one of the famous (or maybe the most famous if you only knew him), even though he is not a k-idol. Honorable Mentions: G-Dragon (Bigbang)Hui (Pentagon)B.I, Bobby (iKON)Namjoon (BTS)Shinsadong Tiger (produced Momoland's Boom Boom and Baam, has a company that manages EXID under him)Tablo (Epik High)Seungyoon, Seunghoon, Mino (Winner)Soyeon (G Idle)CL (2NE1)LE (EXID)Edit: Woozi (Seventeen)Guys I didn't know he could compose XD and to those who didn't know, I wanna share it with yaa Edit: Suga (BTS)
